definitions.definition: the flat part on a knife or similar tool or weapon, with a very thin edge used for cutting:
examples: a sword with a steel blade

definitions.definition: a wide, flat part on a tool or machine, used to push back water or air:
used in the names of other objects that are flat, thin, and sometimes long, like a blade
a long, narrow leaf of grass or a similar plant:
the metal part on the bottom of an ice skate
a curved device that a person who has lost part of a leg can attach to their body where the leg was, in order to be able to walk or run, for example in a race :
examples: The blades, made from lightweight carbon fibre, store kinetic energy in a similar fashion to a spring and allow the athlete to run and jump.
